prp-hair.description: Triple-spin PRP packed with growth factors is injected across thinning areas to improve blood flow, prolong the anagen phase, and increase hair density.
prp-hair.shortDescription: Platelet-rich plasma injections that stimulate dormant follicles.

regenera-treatment.description: A small tissue sample is processed in-clinic to release progenitor cells and growth factors, which are then injected into thinning areas to rebuild the follicular environment.
regenera-treatment.title: Regenera® Micro-Graft
regenera-treatment.shortDescription: Autologous micrografts rich in progenitor cells to reset scalp biology.

polynucleotide-hair.shortDescription: Hydrates, soothes, and thickens hair via PN-HPT injections.
polynucleotide-hair.title: Polynucleotide Scalp Booster
polynucleotide-hair.description: Polynucleotides nourish the scalp, reduce inflammation, and improve hair shaft quality—ideal for clients with sensitivity or as maintenance between PRP/exosome sessions.

exosome-treatment.description: Lab-purified exosomes packed with cytokines and mRNA are microneedled into the scalp to reboot follicles resistant to PRP alone.

introduction.content: We combine diagnostics (trichoscopy, hormone labs, ferritin, thyroid panels) with multi-layered therapy so regrowth is measurable. Plans may include PRP, exosomes, Regenera®, polynucleotides, low-level laser therapy, and prescription topicals—all delivered in private suites with minimal downtime.
introduction.title: More Than PRP

longDescription: Hair loss can impact confidence at any age. Our hair restoration clinic blends platelet-rich plasma, exosome therapy, Regenera® micro-grafts, and polynucleotide boosters to reactivate follicles while calming inflammation. Each protocol begins with trichoscopy, hormone labs, and lifestyle analysis so every vial and vitamin supports regrowth from the inside out.
